title: Hello! I'am Danil Listov!
content:
I'm Frontend engineer who specializes in the Vue.js JavaScript framework for building user interfaces and single-page applications. I have expertise in creating interactive and dynamic web applications using Vue.js and its associated ecosystem.

I also have strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Can use different front-end technologies and frameworks for building UI which strikes a balance between aesthetics and functionality, making it simple and enjoyable for users to interact with.
